Class ScaleConversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • maps.ScaleConversion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CoordinateConversion

    public class ScaleConversion
extends java.lang.Object
implements CoordinateConversion
    A coordinate conversion that scales and translates coordinates.

        Construct a ScaleConversion.
        Parameters:
        xOrigin - The x coordinate of the new origin.
        yOrigin - The y coordinate of the new origin.
        xScale - The scale factor for x coordinates.
